bibl.title: Chin Quock Wah vs. Henry M. White. Criminal.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Western District Court of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In the Matter of the Application of Chin Quock Wah for a Writ of Habeas Corpus ) No. 2971
THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION ) SS.

Henry M. White, being first duly sworn on oath, deposes and says: That he is Commissioner of Immigration at Seattle, Washington, and that the attached bill in favor of J.Richard Lane, Esq., is a just bill for the board of the petitioner herein from March 4, 1915 to after dinner June 10, 1915, as therein specified and that the money now on deposit in the Registry of the Court for the payment of the board of said petitioner should be applied on said bill.
div1.ab: Henry M. White Commissioner of Immigration.
div1.p: Subscribed and sworn to before me this 25 day of June, 1915.
div1.ab: John H. Sargent Notary Public in and for the State of Washington, residing at Seattle
